733     sql = f"""\
734         SELECT n.nspname AS schema,
735                t.typname AS name,
736                pg_catalog.format_type(t.typbasetype, t.typtypmod) as type,
737                pg_catalog.ltrim((COALESCE((SELECT (' collate ' || c.collname)
738                                            FROM pg_catalog.pg_collation AS c,
739                                                 pg_catalog.pg_type AS bt
740                                            WHERE c.oid = t.typcollation
741                                              AND bt.oid = t.typbasetype
742                                              AND t.typcollation <> bt.typcollation) , '')
743                                 || CASE
744                                      WHEN t.typnotnull
745                                        THEN ' not null'
746                                      ELSE ''
747                                    END) || CASE
748                                              WHEN t.typdefault IS NOT NULL
749                                                THEN(' default ' || t.typdefault)
750                                              ELSE ''
751                                            END) AS modifier,
752                pg_catalog.array_to_string(ARRAY(
753                  SELECT pg_catalog.pg_get_constraintdef(r.oid, TRUE)
754                  FROM pg_catalog.pg_constraint AS r
755                  WHERE t.oid = r.contypid), ' ') AS check {extra_cols}
756         FROM pg_catalog.pg_type AS t
